Zardus isn't in the old Alliance base, SoulStice, he's in the Iron 
Fist. And if Surge is in the Iron Fist, then he'd be putting Kracked 
and Grenade into CR tanks instead of chambers.

But did Surge enter the old base or the IF?



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> (Goody!) Deemos, Shokaract, and their mini-teams come up to the 
Alliance
> base. Serge managed to arrive, and he looked at Zardus. (If he's 
still
> there, if he's inside, then Serge went inside.) Serge handed Zardus
> Beholder's pieces.
> 
> Serge: ....clone....him.....
> 
> Serge had thought in his eyes and moved to the CR Chambers, where he
> deposited Kracken and Grenade...
